amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that direct use solar energy technology is considered a renewable energy source for the purposes of the requirement that DOD obtain 25% of its facility energy from renewable sources by 2025.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 52 printed in House Report 112-485 to clarify that direct use solar energy technology is considered a renewable energy source for the purposes of the requirement that DOD obtain 25% of its facility energy from renewable sources by 2025.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Petri amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
